message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. You can try to negotiate from here.
I'll start with a 50/50 split. Your turn to negotiate!
I'll meet you halfway between 50/50 and my original offer. Your turn to think!
I'll take a bit more, but still leave you with a decent share. Your turn again!
I'll compromise a bit more. Can we meet in the middle?
I'll take a bit more, but still leave you with a small share. Your turn to think!
I'll try to find a sweet spot. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
